A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Takes immense risks. Delivers. Destroys expectations of character tropes. Delivers. I even enjoyed the oddball moments on Canto Bight. A film which definitely does not destroy Star Wars but breathes new life into an expected pattern of events. I understand the hatred but it is a result of nostalgia and prejudice blinding us. This is modern Star Wars. Live with it.
